app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Vskit Funny Videos Editor
app_description: Vskit is an easy to use short video application with over 100 million users. No matter where you are you can watch and create popular and funny videos for free. Choose Vskit to record share your life by short videos express yourself easily and make friends across Africa! Discover African Trending Videos Recommend millions of the hottest short videos daily from Africa and around the world and make you learn about the local trends. Find amazing videos by talented African content creators here! Special Effects Super Duper Cool Beautiful Easy to record your beautiful moments with amazing new filters beauty and makeup features! Customize your videos with various most fashionable effects funny stickers other shooting templates. One Click to complete your video by using various real time updated photo templates easily. Duet with anyone you like The next African short video talent could be you Creation Music Pro Editor Free to use global latest music from around the world across all genres such as Pop Afrobeats Gospel music etc. to create your viral music video. Various practical editing tools can help you make more professional and unique video in app easily. Social Community Share the happy times Millions of Vskiters are online every day It is easy to make friends! Support to send text pictures and videos to your friends making interaction easier One click to download and share your content to Instagram WhatsApp and other social media platforms giving you a larger audience to showcase your creativity! On Vskit you will find the real people real life real feeling. A place where you can express yourself in your way. A bigger world awaits. Join vskit!
